content: Hello everyone! This is Mahbod Sabbaghi of Canada perticipating in this years GCI! So far the task that seems more interesting is the one in which we must program something in any language and have it download BRL-CAD data. :smiley:
Welcome @Mahbod Sabbaghi ! I commented your task, sadly more work to do. But not much :wink:
Hi, I'm new here. I'm currently planning to finish one task a day, which makes it 33 tasks by the end of the contest. Is that possible?
absolutely possible, probably even more if you try
that will almost certainly put you in the top 10

just beware that some tasks may take several review iterations (especially as you get started, especially with design tasks), and you may only get 1 review per day, but then that can increase to 2-3 tasks per day as you get more proficient or tackle tasks that have more specific completion criteria
Welcome @Shruthik Erana, nice to have you here!
